name: 60s To Die Alpha
description:
60s To Die is an indie game made by ImZary, it was originally made for the brackeys & the wowie jam 3.0, its still in developement & the project future is kinda unknown, since Zary may or may not resume the project, but we will see, he is hoping that he may publish it one day as his first commercial game ! but untill then, we will see !

But if you really want zary to resume working on this project, please support him with feeback & bug reports, & zary may or may not work in this project for a long time, since he need to focus this year on his national exam, & he still studying so that he can go to high school, so please understand his situation, & thanks :D

its just me feeling lonely so i am talking like somebody is talking about me 

Controlls : Arrow key left & right to move, or A & D Keys

Space To Jump.

R To Restart(yes this is a new feature)

Check the Patch Note of the game
